00224             case R.id.refresh:
00225               Toast.makeText(this, "Action refresh selected", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT)
00226                   .show();

00234               break;

00276         public String call(String message) throws Exception {
00277                 String response = null;
00278                 String corrId = java.util.UUID.randomUUID().toString();
00279                 BasicProperties props = new BasicProperties.Builder()
00280                                 .correlationId(corrId).replyTo(replyQueueName).build();
00281 
00282                 channel.basicPublish("", requestQueueName, props, message.getBytes());
00283                 int timeout_ms = 30000;
00284 
00285                 while (true) {
00286 
00287                         QueueingConsumer.Delivery delivery = consumer
00288                                         .nextDelivery(timeout_ms);
00289                         if (delivery == null) {
00290                                 if (channel.isOpen() == false) // Seems to always return true
00291                                 {
00292 
00293                                         System.out.println("Channel is not open");
00294                                 }
00295                         } else {
00296 
00297                                 // ... Process message - delivery.getBody()
00298                                 if (delivery.getProperties().getCorrelationId().equals(corrId)) {
00299                                         response = new String(delivery.getBody());
00300                                         break;
00301                                 }
00302                         }
00303                 }
00304 
00305                 return response;
00306                 // return "response";
00307         }

00377         public void aidm(){
00378 
00379                 // The output TextView we'll use to display messages
00380                 mOutput = (TextView) findViewById(R.id.txtPlaces1);
00381                 mOutput2 = (TextView) findViewById(R.id.txtPlaces2);
00382 
00383                 // Create the consumer
00384 
00385                 try {
00386 
00387                         ConnectionFactory factory = new ConnectionFactory();
00388                         factory.setHost("54.235.169.93");
00389                         connection = factory.newConnection();
00390                         channel = connection.createChannel();
00391 
00392                         replyQueueName = channel.queueDeclare().getQueue();
00393                         consumer = new QueueingConsumer(channel);
00394                         channel.basicConsume(replyQueueName, true, consumer);
00395 
00396                         System.out.println(" [x] Requesting places()");
00397                         String response = call("30");
00398                         System.out.println(" [.] Got '" + response + "'");
00399 
00400                         String[] str = response.split(",");
00401                         String place1 = str[0].toString();
00402                         String place2 = str[1].toString();
00403 
00404                         place1 = place1.replace("\'", "");
00405                         place2 = place2.replace("\'", "");
00406                         place1 = place1.trim();
00407                         place2 = place2.trim();
00408 
00409                         //System.out.println(place1);
00410                         //System.out.println(place2);
00411 
00412                         // variable that you would use to fill text box
00413                         // response example
00414                         // 'movie_rental' (31)'spa' (12), 'church' (36), 'school'
00415                         // (48), '
00416                         mOutput.setText(place1.toString());
00417                         mOutput2.setText(place2.toString());
00418 
00419                         connection.close();
00420                         
00421                         //Apriori ap = new Apriori();
00422                         //ap.readFromFile("http://ec2-50-17-51-53.compute-1.amazonaws.com/PlacesandPlaces/goods.txt");
00423                         //mOutput.setText(ap.text1);
00424                         //mOutput2.setText(ap.text2);
00425                         
00426                         
00427 
00428                 } catch (Exception e) {
00429                         // TODO Auto-generated catch block
00430                         e.printStackTrace();
00431                 }
00432         }
